snippet: Some bird species had a four-wing body plan before they lost hind-limb feathers and started to use those limbs to walk, scientists reported Thursday.
abstract: Chinese scientists publish study in journal Science reporting discovery of some primitive bird fossils showing species with four-wing body plan before they lost hind-limb feathers and used those limbs to walk.
lead_paragraph: Some bird species had a four-wing body plan before they lost hind-limb feathers and started to use those limbs to walk, scientists reported Thursday.

headline.seo: Early Bird Species Had Four Wings, Scientists Find
headline.main: Some Primitive Birds Flew With 4 Wings, Study Says
headline.print_headline: Some Primitive Birds Flew With 4 Wings, Study Says
